InstallTask.promptText: Warning! Launch Safeties cannot be disabled in online mode to ensure a level playing field for all players;;Yes, I understand;;No thanks
InstallTask.uiDescription: Fight for your choosen faction against other players for supremacy over the Inner Sphere
Offline Mode with Interactive Inner Sphere
Base difficulty goes up the more money your mechs are worth. 16,500,000 cbills per half-skull. It counts the most expensive mechs you can drop. +5% Online Progress.
InstallTask.uiName: Difficulty by Company Strength - Challenge scales with the cost of your mechs

InstallTask.uiDescription: Every Planet has their own Difficulty Rating Some systems are difficult, some are easy.
InstallTask.uiName: Difficulty by Planet Rating - Planets never change their Skulls.

InstallTask.uiDescription: Randomizes Combat Starting Position.
Disabled Random Combat Starting Position. -2% Online Progress.
Choose a Deployment Position on Mission Start. -2% Online Progress.
Your Units are automatically deployed.
Manually control Convoy Missions
Ai controls Convoy Missions.
Receive Allied Support on Tougher Contracts.

InstallTask.promptText: Warning! Enemies will vastly outnumber you?;;Yes, Hurt me!;;No Way
InstallTask.uiDescription: DO NOT! Receive Allied Support on Tougher Contracts.
Standard Map Size.
33% Increased Map Size. +3% Online Progress.
66% Increased Map Size. +6% Online Progress.
100% Increased Map Size. +10% Online Progress.
Damage and status effects as floaties around the mech, no Combat Log
Converts all Floaties to persistent Combat Log in the upper right corner
Start the Game with pre-defined Pilots. They have painted pictures and unused EXP
Start the Game with randomly generated, editable, Pilots. Ones like you commonly find in the hiring hall. +1% Online Progress.

InstallTask.promptText: Challenging Content! Urban Biomes will be rough.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;BASEMENT DEMOLISHERS WOOO!!;;No
InstallTask.uiDescription: Urban Biomes my includes ambushes, traps and destroyed Ennviroment. +2% Online Progress.
InstallTask.uiName: Change Urban Biomes to wartorn Nightmares

InstallTask.uiDescription: Content based on and requiring the Flashpoint DLC

InstallTask.uiDescription: Unleash the desperate technologies and prototypes of the Society as they try to topple the Warrior Caste during the Wars of Reaving. +1% Online Progress.

InstallTask.promptText: Warning! Everyone will have access to Nuclear Weapons.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, Nuke me from Orbit!;;No Way

InstallTask.uiDescription: Armor Damage persists after Battle and requires time and money to repair. But base tech points are boosted. The suggested game mode.
Armor Damage does not persist after Battle. Just like vanilla. But you have fewer base MechTech points. Training Wheels Mode. -50% Online Progress.
InstallTask.uiName: FREE Armor Repair After Battle - Lower base MechTech points
